A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The acting was phenomenal.  Mark Hamill\, Carrie Fisher\, & Daisy Ridley were absolutely spot on.\n\nNot even these actors can overcome the atrocious writing.  Huge mistakes\, small mistakes.  No vision in the writing or directing.  It's almost as if a pubescent troll was given the Star Wars reigns for a movie.
